response.skills: Engineering, Software Development, Test Automation, Cybersecurity, Aerospace Engineering, Telecommunications, Consulting, C#, Java, JavaScript, C++, Visual Studio, Databases, .NET Framework, Microsoft SQL Server, Soft Skills, Decision-Making, Communication, Teamwork, Problem Solving

profile_positions.description: Engineer role with wide coverage in the whole project development environment from the requirements definition until final tests and implementation with the customer, currently focused on the integration, validation, verification and quality stage of biometrical and identity solutions for governments abroad.
profile_positions.title: IVVQ Engineer

profile_positions.description: In order to offer Mobile Network Operators the highest security systems to connect their users safely to their networks, this role develops and personalizes the most important element for their services, their chips, commonly known as Sim Cards. This process is done from the beginning with the definition of the product, until the development and massive distribution of the final sims always giving technical advice and attending the customer requirements. Projects done with corporative tools, but also additional projects were done with C# in Visual Studio to optimize quotidian processes.
profile_positions.title: Technical Consultant MS&IoT (Mobile Services & Internet of Things)

profile_positions.description: Skidata security system is a hardware and software elements set together to control access in any place. Nevertheless, this system does not satisfy the legal requirements in Colombia that is why it is needed to improve this lake in Skidata system through the development of software changing original HMI and adding transparent features for the users to be able of manage the legal specifications. Project done with C# in Visual Studio, plus database tools as SQLServer, and others as .NET and Web Service knowledge also used.
profile_positions.title: Support and Development Engineer

profile_positions.description: Software development to improve the user experience with the data generated and transmited by the military airplane A400M. This development consisted in the management of database information through a new HMI able to add, erase, edit and save data for finally generate files easy to understand. Project done with C# in Visual Studio, plus some database tools as SQLServer.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer Intern

company.name: Thales
company.description:
Thales is a global technology leader with more than 77,000 employees on five continents. The Group is investing in digital and “deep tech” innovations – Big Data, artificial intelligence, connectivity, cybersecurity and quantum technology – to build a future we can all trust. Trust is essential for societies to flourish, with humans playing a central role in every critical decision.
Thales's high-tech solutions, services and products help companies, organisations and governments to achieve their goals and ambitions. And in each of our five vertical markets — digital identity and security, defence and security, aerospace, space, and transport — our customers play a vital role in society.
